en-GB.name: Companies House
en-GB.description:
Request information for any company on the Companies House register. 

This skill allows users to access public information from Companies House and the https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk website.

If you own or follow a certain company, Alexa the skill will store your company so you can ask for details of that company. Perhaps you'd like to be told when the accounts are due, or when the confirmation statement needs to be filed. The Companies House Skill will also tell you about the company's latest filing history.


Want to know your accounting and confirmation statement due dates? 
Just say: Alexa, ask company house to tell me about <Company Number>.

Want to know who the officers are of that company? Ask Companies House tell me the officers of <Company Number>
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask companies house for company number five four two two two
Alexa ask companies house to remember company five four two two two
Alexa ask companies house who are the appointments of five four two two two

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
To query companies you'll need to look up some company numbers on https://beta.companieshouse.gov.uk/ where companies can be searched for.

For instance a well known company, Tesco PLC 00445790 (or shortened to 445790)
